title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be interacted with, but they do not have any effect on the image. This issue becomes evident when opening a small image, such as an icon, as the scrollbars are misleading since they do not have any functionality.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled and should not be interactable when opening an image.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Build F2 (20020602) Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only)
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around, but they do not have any effect on the image
